name: Dumb Ghost That Stacks Things
description:
A Non-action based adventure game where you trade items with NPCs and progress by giving them the correct item. Give them the wrong thing and they'll get MAD.

Created for the Mystery Box Jam!

CONTROLS

  • ARROW KEYS: Move
  • Z: Talk To NPC
  • X: Drop Topmost Item
  • SPACE (HOLD): Dance
  • ESC: Pause
